author: Katie Nicholson,Jason Ho,Jeff Yates
title: Viral video claiming 5G caused pandemic easily debunked
description: A viral video by an American doctor who is on disciplinary probation contains false claims and inaccuracies about the coronavirus pandemic that are easily debunked by virologists, CBC News has found.
content:
A viral video by an American doctor who is on disciplinary probation claims that the coronavirus pandemic was caused by 5G technology. 
However, it contains many false claims and inaccuracies that are easily debunked by virologists, CBC News has found.
